itunes:title: Episode 781​ - Special Guest General Clay Hutmacher
title: Episode 781​ - Special Guest General Clay Hutmacher
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by General Clay Hutmacher (Ret.) to talk about his experience flying combat missions in Panama and during Desert Storm while a member of the 160th SOAR as well as his experience as a commander in Iraq and Afghan...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by General Clay Hutmacher (Ret.) to talk about his experience flying combat missions in Panama and during Desert Storm while a member of the 160th SOAR as well as his experience as a commander in Iraq and Afghanistan, the most difficult missions he's ever flown, and the funniest propaganda he saw the South Koreans launch into North Korea.
